description:
Emerging into the hall the voices come clearer, it's your family laughing and joking in the kitchen. Parents and all 4 siblings laughing in unison at something that was apparently hilarious. You can't really make it out, but you catch what you think is the tail end of the story repeated, "..Peo, I swear to God, and he picked it himself"
You're alone in the hallway, door to the kitchen in front, bedroom to your left. Your 15 minutes are running out, might need to get a move on

responses.look: Looks to have been tidied recently, nothing of note to see
responses.listen: Just laughs, snickers, the odd "oh dear me!"
responses.parent: Yeah, you know, ma and da, John and Fiona
responses.sibling: Yep, Conrad, Rodrick, Siobhan and Maria

defaults: Talking like a man with half a naggin' in him
Any chance of you talking some sense there?
As the saying goes, "What in under God are you blatherin on about?"
